I've re-opened HER-1103, since I believe it can be backported without fuss.

I'll let Gordon speak to HER-1311...

-Paul

> Dear IA-Team,
>
> looking at JIRA and SVN I'm well aware that you guys are really busy
> with work on Heritrix 2.x, but I'm wondering what chances are to see
> issue HER-1103 fixed for 1.x branch, too. (The "Fix Version/s" field
> suggests it will be fixed in 1.x, the tracker entry is allready marked
> as fixed - but nothing happened in 1.x regarding this issue so far.)
>
> A similar question is: are there any chances "[HER-1311] Prioritzation
> refactoring: implement single privileged Frontier manager thread;
> mediation queues" will be backported to 1.x? Or is it even possible?
> (I might give it a try myself if you say it could be done within a
> reasonable timeframe.)
>
> Regards
>   Olaf Freyer
>
>
